text: Aur un teeno ko bhi usne maaf kiya jinke maamle ko multawi(put off) kardiya gaya tha, jab zameen apni saari wusat (vastness) ke bawajood unpar tangg ho gayi aur unki apni jaanein bhi unpar baar honay lagi aur unhon ne jaan liya ke Allah se bachne ke liye koi jaaye panaah khud Allah hi ke daaman e rehmat ke siwa nahin hai, to Allah apni meharbani se unki taraf palta taa-ke woh uski taraf palat aayein. Yaqeenan woh bada maaf karne wala aur raheem hai
